article.Heading: Budget 2016: Top trading tips from market experts
article.Summary: Watch the interview of Ashwani Gujral, Fund manager of ashwanigujral.com, Sudarshan Sukhani of s2analytics.com, SP Tulsian of sptulsian.com and Prakash Diwan of prakashdiwan.in with Latha Venkatesh and Sonia Shenoy on CNBC-TV18.
article.Body:
Watch the interview of Ashwani Gujral, Fund manager of ashwanigujral.com, Sudarshan Sukhani of s2analytics.com, SP Tulsian of sptulsian.com and Prakash Diwan of prakashdiwan.in with Latha Venkatesh and Sonia Shenoy on CNBC-TV18, in which they shared their readings and outlook on market technicals, fundamentals and F&O side of the market as well as specific stocks and sectors.

For entire discussion, watch accompanying videos.
